Package syntaxtree

Class AST

  • java.lang.Object
    • syntaxtree.AST
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassDecl, Exp, FieldDecl, Formal, ICommand, MethodDecl, Program, Stm, Type, Var

    public abstract class AST
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class for all abstract syntax. Provides the ability to tag ASTs with additional information to aid error reporting.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AST​()
      Initialise the error-reporting tag list.

    • Method Detail

      • tag

        public void tag​(java.lang.String t)
        Add a tag for error-reporting.
        Parameters:
        t - the tag

      • tag

        public void tag​(int line,
                int column)
        Add a tag describing a position in a source-code file (line and column).
        Parameters:
        line - the line number
        column - the column number

      • tag

        public void tag​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ts)
        Add a list of tags for error-reporting.
        Parameters:
        ts - the tags

      • globalTag

        public static void globalTag​(java.lang.String t)
        Add a global tag. A global tag is inherited by all AST objects when they are created.
        Parameters:
        t - the tag

      • clearGlobalTags

        public static void clearGlobalTags​()
        Reset the global tags to empty. Note: this does not remove global tags from AST objects which have already been created.

      • getTags

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTags​()
        The error-reporting tags for this AST object. If no tags have been added, this list will be null.
        Returns:
        the error reporting tags (may be null)
